scripts.bundle: export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && cp -r *.lua info.json graphics locale prototypes build/tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION && cd build && zip -r tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION.zip tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION
scripts.copy: export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && rsync -r --exclude node_modules $PWD/ ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION/
scripts.deploy: rm -rf ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/tony_hacks_pro_rails* && export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && cp build/tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION.zip ~/Library/Application\ Support/factorio/mods/
scripts.prebuild: rm -rf build && export VERSION=$(cat info.json | jq -r .version) && mkdir -p build/tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION
scripts.release: VERSION=$(cat package.json | jq -r .version) && RELEASE=tony_hacks_pro_rails_$VERSION && rm -rf $RELEASE && mkdir -p $RELEASE && cp -r *.lua info.json thumbnail.png prototypes sounds src locale graphics $RELEASE && rm -rf build && mkdir -p build && zip -r build/$RELEASE.zip $RELEASE && rm -rf $RELEASE
